author: By EMILY SWANSON and JOSH BOAK The Associated Press
title: AP-NORC poll: Widespread support for virus relief package
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — A new poll from The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research finds that positive views of the nation's economy are down dramatically just since January, with 60% of Americans now saying the economy is “poor” after…
content: WASHINGTON (AP) A new poll from The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research finds that positive views of the nation's economy are down dramatically just since January, with 60% of Americans now saying the economy is poor after 67% called it g… [+3524 chars]
